greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Polylogarithm li(-n,-7/8) multiplied by (15^(n+1))/8.
comment: See the sequence A212846 which describes the general case of li(-n,-p/q). This sequence is obtained for p=7,q=8.
link: Stanislav Sykora, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: See formula in A212846, setting p=7,q=8.
mathematica: p = 7; q = 8; f[n_] := PolyLog[-n, -p/q] (p + q)^(n + 1)/q; f[0] = 1; Array[f, 20, 0] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 25 2015 *)
results.author: _Stanislav Sykora_, Jun 06 2012
